contextId.information: This refers to the day when God will judge all people. You can translate this using a verbal phrase. AT: "when he comes to judge everyone" (UDB) (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_abstractnouns]] and [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: on the day of his coming

contextId.information: Baptism is the means by which God saves people. AT: "the baptism by which God saves you now" (See: [[:en:ta:vol1:translate:figs_explicit]])
contextId.quote: the baptism that saves you now
